content: tails) is updated based on the retrieved data. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Table|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | |legId|`SCHEDOPS.LEG`|`LEG_NO`| | |regId|`schedops.LEG`|`AC_REGISTRATION`| | |rotId| | |N/A in the source system.| |startTime|`schedops.LEG`|`DEP_SCHED_DT`, `DEP_DT`|when `schedops.LEG.DEP_SCHED_DT` is not null then `schedops.LEG.DEP_SCHED_DT` else `schedops.LEG.DEP_DT`| |endTime|`schedops.LEG`|`ARR_SCHED_DT`, `ARR_DT`|when `schedops.LEG.ARR_SCHED_DT` is not null then `schedops.LEG.ARR_SCHED_DT` else `schedops.LEG.ARR_DT`| |code|`schedops.LEG`|`FN_CARRIER`| | |station|`schedops.LEG`|`DEP_AP_ACTUAL`| | |status|`schedops.LEG`|`LEG_STATE`| | # Aircraft Minimum Equipment List Data Model ### Data Retrieval > Modified MEL Items are published by SXS Internal Systems to the EventHub topic: `com.riverx.topic.in.flight.aircraftmel.source` {.is-info} #### - Data Retrieval Scope * Retrieve newly published events from the relevant EventHub topic #### - Source Event Broker Topic * `melitem`: `com.riverx.topic.in.flight.aircraftmel.source` #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps **Trigger:** Each new event published to the topic **Steps:** Retrieve events #### - Change Data Capture Operation * Unique Key: `workOrderId` (see Mapping for details) * Insert and update operations are carried out using Unique Key. * No delete operation is performed; instead, `status` is updated based on the retrieved data. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Topic|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | |workOrderId|`melitem`|`workorderNumber`| | |regId|`melitem`|`aircraftRegistration`| | |status|`melitem`|`operationCode`| | |issueDate|`melitem`|`issueDate`| | |clearedDate|`melitem`|`clearedDate`| | |limitFlightHour|`melitem`|`limits.hours`| | |limitLandingCycle|`melitem`|`limits.cycles`| | |limitDay|`melitem`|`limit.days`| | |ataReference|`melitem`|`ATAReference`| | |description|`melitem`|`description`| | |cdl|`melitem`|`isCdl`|
